Config.description: Config represents the configuration structure for the application.

provider.description: Provider is the name of the LLM provider.

modelName.description: ModelName is the name of the model to use, without prefixes (e.g. gemini-2.5-flash-lite).

promptTemplate.description: PromptTemplate is the template for the prompt to send to the LLM. The user input will be inserted into the {{.UserInput}} placeholder.

openai.description: OpenAI represents the configuration for OpenAI LLMs.

LLMConfig.description: LLMConfig represents the configuration for the Language Model.

OpenAIConfig.description: OpenAIConfig represents the configuration for OpenAI LLMs.
